content: {"name": "Epworth United Methodist Church", "alternate_name": "", "description": " Guests are served a Bagged Lunch May through Sep: Monday \u2013 Friday, 1:30 \u2013 2:30p.m.\n  Guests are served Hot Meals Oct through Apr: Monday \u2013 Friday, 3:30 \u2013 4:30p.m.", "email": "", "url": "https://www.lordstablesoupkitchen.org/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "9008 Rosemont Drive", "address_2": null, "city": "Gaithersburg", "state_province": "MD", "postal_code": "20877", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 39.1273493, "longitude": -77.1856839}, "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "17:30", "closes_at": "18:30"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "17:30", "closes_at": "18:30"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "17:30", "closes_at": "18:30"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "17:30", "closes_at": "18:30"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "17:30", "closes_at": "18:30"}]}
